words.def: a message whose ingenuity or verbal skill or incongruity has the power to evoke laughter
a period of time equal to 1/24th of a day
the state of being or appearing to be actively engaged in an activity
a unit of electrical resistance equal to the resistance between two points on a conductor when a potential difference of one volt between them produces a current of one ampere
a unit of conductance equal to the reciprocal of an ohm
the 17th letter of the Greek alphabet
A member of the Romani people.
a midwestern state in north central United States in the Great Lakes region
a trivalent metallic element of the rare earth group
the 12th letter of the Greek alphabet
a state in northwestern United States on the Pacific
